definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: Its mild, not cold but not dry, young and old Safe.
sentences.chinese: 它的品性溫和，不涼不燥，男女老幼皆宜。

sentences.english: The swimming movement is one which of sports items the male and female old and young like.
sentences.chinese: 游泳運動是男女老幼都喜歡的體育項目之一。

sentences.english: The school is open to all the people , old and young, rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: 這學校對所有人都開放，男女老幼，窮人富人。

sentences.english: Young or old, male or female. There is nothing more important than good health and general wellbeing .
sentences.chinese: 無論是男女老幼，沒有東西比身心健康重要。

sentences.english: Socks are commonly worn by people, by men and women, old and young.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，男女老幼各種人都要穿短襪。

sentences.english: All the villagers, old and young , man and woman, came to welcome the visitors.
sentences.chinese: 全體村民，男女老幼都來歡迎來訪的客人了。

sentences.english: Socks are commonly worn by people by men and women old and young .
sentences.chinese: 一般說來，男女老幼各種人都要穿短襪。

sentences.english: Men and women, old and young, all pitched in.
The person of all ages and both gender may have that symptom.
sentences.chinese: 是臨牀上常見的病症，發病廣泛，男女老幼皆可罹患。

sentences.english: Weekend-warrior injuries can hit men and women, both young and old.
sentences.chinese: 週末鬥士行爲對男女老幼都會產生傷害。

definition: men, women, young and old/all kinds of people/people of all ages
taking everyone along, young and old/to look after the elderly and the young
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
supporting a wife and children/dragged down by having a family to feed
lit. cries of grief shake the heavens/great sorrow (idiom)
